name: school-course-app
description: This program couples a server-side REST API together with a client-side React frontend as its counterpart. Together they let a user perform basic CRUD-operations on a kind of "school"-database which contains several courses on different topics. A (short) documentation for the API-part can be found at https://github.com/Develooper-Dan/rest-api. Here I will focus on the React frontend. The general layout and style of this app were provided by Team Treehouse.

scripts.start: cd api && npm install && npm start
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build
